meanings.definition: Having both male and female reproductive organs in the same individual.
meanings.sent1: The homothallic organism can reproduce on its own without needing a mate.
meanings.sent2: The homothallic plant can self-pollinate to produce seeds.
meanings.sent3: The homothallic creature threw a party for itself to celebrate its unique abilities.
meanings.sent4: The homothallic species is like a one-person band, playing all the musical instruments at once.
meanings.sent5: The homothallic nature of the organism makes it a true marvel of biology.

meanings.definition: Relating to a type of sexual reproduction in which a single organism is capable of producing both male and female gametes.
meanings.sent1: The homothallic fungi can undergo sexual reproduction without needing a partner.
meanings.sent2: In homothallic reproduction, the organism can fertilize itself.
meanings.sent3: The homothallic process seemed like a magical trick performed by the organism.
meanings.sent4: The homothallic ability of the organism is like having a built-in fertility clinic.
meanings.sent5: The homothallic characteristic of the species is truly fascinating to observe.
